item.title: CA-14 North at CA-58 West Onramp
item.description: CA-14 North at CA-58 West onramp to Bakersfield.

item.title: CA-14 North at CA-58
item.description: CA-14 north at CA-58 (Exit 167) junction. Turn right for CA-58 East to Barstow; continue over overpass and then left for CA-58 west to Bakersfield.

item.title: CA-14 South/Bus. CA-58 East at Split
item.description: CA-14 South/Bus. CA-58 East at split on south side of Mojave. Turn left for Bus. CA-58 East To CA-58. Continue ahead for CA-14 south to Los Angeles.

item.title: CA-14 South at CA-58
item.description: CA-14 south at CA-58. Turn right for CA-58 west to Bakersfield. Continue over overpass and take second right for CA-58 east to Barstow.

item.title: CA-14 South Approaching CA-58
item.description: CA-14 South approaching CA-58 to Barstow (east) and Bakersfield (west).

item.title: US-395 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 south. Distance to CA-14 junction, CA-58 junction, and I-5 (To Los Angeles) junction.

item.title: I-40 West - I-15/CA-58 Access
item.description: Approaching Exit 1 on I-40 west. There is no direct connection from I-40 west to I-15 north. For I-15 North/Las Vegas access, use Exit 1 (Main St.). For I-15 South/To CA-58 West/San Bernardino continue west on I-40.
